TOUR PROGRAM.
Vietravel.
DAY 1: HO CHI MINH CITY - DA NANG (Lunch - Dinner).
Collapse.
You are present at the Tan Son Nhat Airport, Column 10 - Vietravel's counter, Domestic Terminal.
The tour guide shall make the procedures for you to catch a flight to Da Nang.
Upon arrival in Da Nang Airport, Vietravel's coach and tour guide shall pick up and take you to visit the Ngu Hanh Son: Linh Ung Pagoda, Tang Chon Cave, Hoa Nghiem Cave, Non Nuoc Pagoda, etc.
Them,take a look around the Son Tra Peninsula, visit the Linh Ung Pagoda - which has a statue of the tallest Guan Yin Buddha statue in Vietnam (67m).
In the afternoon, you shall take a coach to My Khe Beach - one of the most charming beach in the planet.
Next, continue to the Hoi An Ancient Town: Bridge Pagoda, Phung Hung Ancient House, Phuoc Kien Assembly Hall, Crafts establishments, then roam freely on the streets of colorful lanterns and buy souvenirs, test your skills in traditional games such as breaking earthen pot, Bai Choi singing.
Stay overnight in Da Nang.
DAY 2: DA NANG – BA NA – HUE (Breakfast – Lunch - Dinner).
Collapse.
You take a coach to visit the Ba Na - Suoi Mo, upon arrival, take the world's longest one-rope cable car to the Ba Na Mountain (cable car expenses excluded), 
enjoy the chilly air of the "Da Lat in the Central", then visit Linh Ung Pagoda, Debay Cellars, Le Jardin D'Amour Garden, etc. Next, you shall go to a new spiritual area of ​​Ba Na to visit the Linh Chua Linh Tu Temple,the Fantasy Park
Continue to go through Hai Van Tunnel - thelongest tunnel in the Southeast Asia region to Hue, on the way to stop and take photos at Lang Co Bay - one of the most beautiful bays in the world.
On arrival in Hue, check in and free at leisure.
In the evening, you are free at leisure or explore Hue City at night.
Stay overnight in Hue.
DAY 3: HUE - LA VANG - PHONG NHA CAVE (Breakfast – Lunch - Dinner).
Collapse.
After buffet breakfast at the hotel, you shall arrive in Dong Hoi (Quang Binh), on the way, stop to visit the La Vang Holy Land - An important shrine of Vietnamese Catholics in Quang Tri, and then visit the Truong Son Martyrs' Cemetery.
Then, continue to Phong Nha Cave - which is considered as the "fairyland" by being hidden in the limestone, covered by tropical forests, magnificent cave system with the longest underground river in the world, next visit: Bi Ky Cave, Toc Tien Cave, Cung Dinh Cave, etc.
Then, depart to Hue at little late, about 08:00 pm.
Stay overnight in Hue.
(Note: In case, you do not visit the Phong Nha Cave, but freely visit and explore Hue on a whole day and self support lunch and dinner, please inform at the time of registration: refund of VND 350,000).
DAY 4: HUE - DA NANG -HO CHI MINH CITY (Breakfast - Lunch).
Collapse.
Eat buffet breakfast at the hotel. Then, take a coach to visit the Tomb of Tu Duc - with charming landscapes and to be one of the tombs with the most beautiful architecture of the Nguyen Kings.
Then, take a coach to visit the Hue Imperial City - the ancient palace of 13 Kings of the Nguyen Dynasty, visit Ngo Mon Gate, Thai Hoa Palace, Purple Forbidden City, The Temple, Hien Lam, Cuu Dinh, then, continue to visit the Thien Mu Pagoda-which is considered as the oldest pagoda in Hue and has preserved many valuable artifacts not only in term of history but also in art.
Next, Vietravel's coach shall take you to the Da Nang airport for a flight to Ho Chi Minh City.
Say goodbye to you and end the tour at Tan Son Nhat airport.

TOUR PROGRAM.
Vietravel.
DAY 1: HCMC - HUE Number of meal: 2 (lunch and dinner).
Collapse.
Tourists gather at Tan Son Nhat Airport, Column No.4, Domestic Terminal. Vietravel tour guides will support the Hue flight procedure for tourists.
At Phu Bai - Hue Airport, Vietravel cars and tour guides drive tourists to Tomb of Tu Duc - a place with charming landscape of mountain and river, which is considered as one of the most beautiful designed mausoleums of Nguyen dynasty.
Vietravel’s cars drive tourists to Dai Noi - the old Royal Palace of 13 Nguyen Kings, Ngo Mon Gate, Thai Hoa Palace, Purple Forbidden City, The Mieu Temple, Hien Lam Cac Pavilion, Cuu Dinh, etc.
The group continues to visit Thien Mu Pagoda - considered as the oldest pagoda in Hue, which stores lots of precious antiques in terms of history and art.
Tourists spend the night in Hue.
DAY 2: HUE - PARADISE CAVE Number of meal: 3 (breakfast, lunch and dinner).
Collapse.
The group takes early departure to Dong Hoi (Quang Binh), and visit Truong Son Martyr’s cemetery on the road.
Paradise Cave - considered as the underground Royal Palace with a beautiful and marvelous limestone cave having a record length of over 30 km.
Tourists spend the night in Quang Binh.
DAY 3: QUANG BINH - LA VANG - LANG CO - DA NANG Number of meal: 3 (breakfast, lunch and dinner).
Collapse.
Tourists take a departure to Hue and visit Quang Tri Ancient Citadel on the way and listen to the tour guide’s introduction of the Demilitarized Zone and Hien Luong Brigde - Ben Hai River (the 17th parallel), then continue to visit La Vang Holy Land.
Lang Co Bay - one of the most beautiful bays in the world for photograph before going through Hai Van Tunnel to Da Nang.
In the afternoon, the group visits Son Tra Peninsula and Linh Ung Pagoda - This place has the highest Quan Yin Statue of Vietnam (67m).
Standing here, tourists can comprehensively admire the whole view of the city, the mountain and Son Tra Sea.
In the evening, tourists can rest at the hotel. Tourists spend the night in Da Nang.
DAY 4: DA NANG - CU LAO CHAM - HOI AN Number of meal: 3 (breakfast, lunch and dinner).
Collapse.
The cars drive tourists to Cua Dai to begin the island exploration tour. After the canoe arrives Bai Lang, tourists visit Cu Lao Cham Conservation Area, Hai Tang Pagoda, Au Thuyen, etc., 
to learn about the island residents’ lives.
After that, boats bring tourists to Bai Xep to freely snorkel to see coral.
After visiting Bai Ong, tourists can immerse in the blue sea and the white sand beach.
In the afternoon, the canoe brings tourists to the mainland. After that, tourists continue to visit Hoi An Ancient Town: Cau Pagoda, Phung Hung Ancient House, Phuoc Kien Assembly Hall, Handicraft Facility, etc., 
Then, tourists spend a night in Da Nang.
DAY 5: DA NANG - BA NA - HCMC Number of meal: 2 (breakfast, lunch).
Collapse.
The cars drive tourists to Ba Na - Suoi Mo, after arriving, tourists take the cable car to Ba Namountain peak (self-sufficient), and enjoy the chilly air of “Da Lat in Central Region”, and visit: Linh Ung Pagoda, Debay Wine cella, Le Jardin D’Amourgarden, etc. Then, tourist visit the new Spiritual Landmark of Ba Na and Linh Chua Linh Tu Temple Fantasy Park
Then, tourists have lunch.
Vietravel’s cars will drive tourists to Da Nang Airport to catch the flight to HCMC.
Vietravel will say goodbye to tourists and end the tour program at Tan Son Nhat Airport.

TOUR PROGRAM.
Vietravel.
DAY 1: HCM City - Noi Bai Airport (HANOI) - YEN BAI - NGHIA LO (Including lunch and dinner).
Collapse.
Gathering in Tan Son Nhat International Airport (Domestic Terminal), receiving guidance to fulfill procedure of the flight to Hanoi.
Arriving at Noi Bai International Airport, starting traveling to Yen Bai.
On the way to Yen Bai, visiting:
- Hung King’s Temple: the place to worship the Hung Kings - who are the first founder of the country, the ancestors of the Vietnamese people, a solemn relic complex on Nghia Linh mountain.
Worshiping ancestors, visiting Thuong temple, Trung temple, Ha temple, Gieng Temple, King Hung Tomb.
- In the evening, enjoying Xoe dancing, finding beautiful traditional culture of Thai ethnic.
Spending a night in Nghia Lo.
DAY 2: NGHIA LO - MU CANG CHAI - SAPA (Including breakfast, lunch, and dinner).
Collapse.
Checking out, going to Mu Cang Chai, passing by:
- Tu Le, enjoying a faint pleasant smell of “new rice” on the roof, a famous place of sticky rice, dried rice flakes.
- Khau Pha Pass: the most dangerous and longest pass on National Highway 32 which is listed as one of “four longest passes” with the length of over 30 kilometers.
- Lim Mong Village: a village of Mong people with the most beautiful paddles in Mu Cang Chai.
Being ready to get in a stupor for beauty of the famous terraced rice fields in 3 communes: La Pan Tan, Che Cu Nha và Ze Xu Phinh.
Visiting large valleys, corners and rice fields curved and folded along the continuous mountain range.
- In the evening, walking and viewing Stone Church of Sapa, having free time to enjoy highland specialties, such as: Roasted pork, roasted eggs, Docynia wine, chatting with ethnic people.
Spending a night in Sapa.
DAY 3: SAPA - DONG TIEN SON - LAI CHAU (Including breakfast, lunch, and dinner).
Collapse.
Starting going to Lai Chau, passing by:.
- Bac Waterfall.
- O Quy Ho Pass: In between Lao Cai and Lai Chau, the pass meandering along Hoang Lien mountain range and also called Sky Gate, one of “four longest passes” in the East of Tay Bac.
- Conquering majestic Fansipan mountain with cable (paid by guest) - named as “the roof of Dong Duong” at the height of 3,143 meters.
Besides, at departure terminal, visiting Trinh Pagoda or wishing wealth and peace to family at Ha Pagoda in departure terminal.
- Tien Son Cave: with marvelous colored veins in various shapes.
The feature is cave bed with a clear stream passing by, meandering along the cave through four seasons.
Spending a night in Lai Chau.
DAY 4: LAI CHAU - DIEN BIEN (Including breakfast, lunch, and dinner).
Collapse.
Starting going to Dien Bien:
- On the way, enjoying the beauty of Tay Bac mountains along Nam Na river and the wetland due to raised water from the damp of Son La Hydropower Plant at the junction of the three rivers including: Da river, Nam Na river and Nam Rom river.
- Dien Bien Phu Museum: Built in 1984 on vacation of 30 years of the historic victory of Dien Bien Phu.
- A1 Hill and Cementary: Visiting A1 Hill, bunker of General de Castries.
Spending a night in Dien Bien.
DAY 5: DIEN BIEN - SON LA - MOC CHAU – HAPPY LAND RESORT (Including breakfast, lunch and dinner).
Collapse.
Starting going to Moc Chau - Son La, visiting:
- Pha Din Pass: Also one of the “four longest passes” in the East of Tay Bac and listed as one of the six most impressive passes in Vietnam.
- Happy Land Moc Chau Resort: Laying in a large valley in Lun village, surrounding with white mountain slopes, and along its downstream there is Sap stream running from Laos with clean and clear water, etc.
All of things create a beautiful and enchanting landscape.
- Moc Chau Tea Plantation: Tea fields along the hills look like greenish terraced rice fields stretching endlessly.
- Specialties produced from famous fresh milk of Moc Chau’s cows, which could be very good as gifts.

check out and depart to Ha Long. Upon arrival at the Ha Long Bay. In the afternoon, you will take a cruise on Ha Long Bay - a beautiful natural and extremely vivid scene, which was a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1994.
From the cruise, you can watch the islands in Halong Bay, including: Ga Choi Island, Lu Huong Island, etc.
Overnight in Halong.
DAY 3: HA LONG – YEN TU - HANOI (Breakfast - Lunch - Dinner).
Collapse.
Visit Bai Chay Bridge, the Quang Ninh Museum.
the Yen Tu Mountain - a natural attraction that was preserved with many historical sites and is known as "the land of Buddhism in Vietnam".
Then, visit the Hoa Yen Pagoda, the Hue Quang Tower (Thap To).
Depart to Hanoi, and stop at Hai Duong to buy local specialties on the way to Hanoi: green bean cake, sweet short cakes, etc.
stay overnight in Hanoi.
DAY 4: HANOI - HO CHI MINH CITY (Breakfast - Lunch).
Collapse.
You will take a coach to travel around Hoan Kiem Lake to watch the Turtle Tower, Ngoc Son Temple, The Huc Bridge.
Continue to visit and explore the life and work of the father of the nation at the Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum: Uncle Ho's Stilt House, Ho Chi Minh Museum,One Pillar Pagoda.
visit the Temple of Literature - where worships the Confucius and the Confucian sages.
Then, you take a coach to Noi Bai airport for a flight to Ho Chi Minh City.
Say goodbye to you and end the tour at Tan Son Nhat airport.
North of Vietnam: Ha Noi - Cruise - Bai Dinh - Trang An - Sung Sot Cave - Titop Island.

DAY 1: HCMC - CAM RANH - NHA TRANG – I RESORT Meals included: 2 meals (Lunch, Dinner).
Collapse.
Gather at column no.04 (Vietjat Air) or column no.10 (Vietnam Airlines/ Jetstar Pacific), Domestic Station - Tan Son Nhat Airport to catch the flight to Cam Ranh - Khanh Hoa.
When arriving, the coach will take you to visit and relax at I-Resort Hot Mineral Spring Center - With quiet space and green trees, appearing as a natural picture characterizing Vietnam, I-Resort is surrounded by majestic mountains by the charming Cai river with uniquely romantic scenery of mountain and water, which will provide you with new life experiences through the unique mineral bathing services creating comfortable and relaxing feelings.
Then check in Vinpearl Resort 5 star. Stay overnight in Vinpearl.
DAY 2: NHA TRANG - VINPEARL RESORT 5* Meals included: 3 (Breakfast – Lunch - Dinner).
Collapse.
After buffet breakfast at the Vinpearl, You can relax at the beach or enjoy the facilities of the resort.
You can also come and enjoy Vinpearl Land Entertainment Paradise (expenses included) - Built on an area of nearly 200,000m2, consisting of various world-class, modern and unique works with the longest over-the-sea cable car system in the world; you can freely shop in the shopping street of over 6,000m2 large, have fun in the water park with a lot of exciting thrilling games and you can participate in outdoor games such as: Spinning acrobatics, carousel horse, gliding, Vinpearl Water park with nearly 300 species of sea creatures and 90m underwater tunnel...
In addition you can enjoy the unique modern water dance performances with music typical of many cultures around the world and live laser effects….
Stay overnight in Vinpearl.
